description: Number of digits in the prime factorization of n (counting terms of the form p^1 as p).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Factorization.
prog: (Haskell)a050252 1 = 1a050252 n = sum $ map a055642 $            (a027748_row n) ++ (filter (> 1) $ a124010_row n)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 03 2013, Jun 21 2011
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
